medical_history.chief_complaint: Early-onset extreme obesity due to a biologically inactive mutant leptin.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Rapid weight gain started in the postnatal period. At 2 years 6 months, the patient weighed 33.7 kg, indicating obesity (>99.9th percentile). Food-seeking behavior was reported by the parents, with hyperphagia evidenced by a total intake of 680 kcal in an ad libitum test breakfast.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had recurrent ear and pulmonary infections requiring two intensive-care hospitalizations for severe pneumonia.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents are healthy, normal-weight Turkish individuals and first-degree cousins.
